1.Title: Hell's Generator
1.Description: When launching an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color>, <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> from <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attacks</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attacks</color> increases by <color=#2BAD00>50%</color> for 10s. This effect can trigger once every 15s.

This effect can trigger once every 15s.
